short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert anything on the webpage into Notion as editable and publishable how-to-guides.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With this extension, you can easily create how-to guides for any wepage. It automatically generates titles and highlights screenshots based on your step-by-step processes, arranging them in sequential order. Unlike other similar extensions that require storing data on their servers and charge for storage or specific features, our extension serves as a bridge. It does not provide any remote services to access your data and only synchronizes to existing widely-recognized platforms based on your choices. These platforms, which you are likely already familiar with, offer powerful features and ecosystems without incurring additional costs. For instance, with Notion, your data syncs, allowing you to edit your how-to guides, export, share, and more.

FEATURES:
- Supports recording any webpage
- Supports anything on any webpage
- Highlights procedural screenshots
- one how-to guides can span across browser tabs and windows
- Save to Notion and Notion-like platforms
- Privacy protection, completely free, and no login required
